title: Column icons don't show up when connecting to a Derby database
description: When trying to connect to a Derby database and creating a dataset, the column icons do not appear.
OB: When connecting to a Derby database and creating a dataset, the column icons do not appear.
EB: When connecting to a Derby database and creating a dataset, the column icons should appear to indicate the type of each column (e.g., string, number, date).
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new project.
2. Create a new report.
3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source to connect to a Derby database.
   - Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver
   - Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui
   - User Name: root
   - Password: root
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a new dataset.
5. In the 'Edit Data Set' window, select 'Query'.
6. Observe that the column icons do not appear in the 'Data Set' window.
